name: anbi1cd
params: wff w0, wff w1, wff w2, wff w3

stmt.origin: syl(w0, wb(wa(w1, w2), wa(w3, w1)), wb(w2, w3))

body.origin:
|- wi(w0, wb(wa(w1, w2), wa(w3, w1)))
-| wi(w0, wb(w2, w3))
-| wi(wb(w2, w3), wb(wa(w1, w2), wa(w3, w1)))

cumulated.origin:
|- wi(w0, wb(wa(w1, w2), wa(w3, w1)))
-| wi(w0, wb(w2, w3))
-| wi(wb(w2, w3), wb(wa(w1, w2), wa(w3, w1)))

stmt.origin: biancomd(wb(w2, w3), wa(w1, w2), w3, w1)

body.origin:
|- wi(wb(w2, w3), wb(wa(w1, w2), wa(w3, w1)))
-| wi(wb(w2, w3), wb(wa(w1, w2), wa(w1, w3)))

cumulated.origin:
|- wi(w0, wb(wa(w1, w2), wa(w3, w1)))
-| wi(w0, wb(w2, w3))
-| wi(wb(w2, w3), wb(wa(w1, w2), wa(w1, w3)))

body.origin: |- wi(wb(w2, w3), wb(wa(w1, w2), wa(w1, w3)))

cumulated.origin:
|- wi(w0, wb(wa(w1, w2), wa(w3, w1)))
-| wi(w0, wb(w2, w3))

comment: Introduce a proposition as left conjunct on the left-hand side and right conjunct on the right-hand side of an equivalence. Deduction form. (Contributed by Peter Mazsa, 22-May-2021.)
